LanguageData.TilledSoil.AffordanceTillLight: Can till anywhere a normal floor can be placed.
LanguageData.TilledSoil.AffordanceTillGrowable: Can only till in growable soil.
LanguageData.TilledSoil.AffordanceDirtLight: Can place dirt anywhere a normal floor can be placed.
LanguageData.TilledSoil.AffordanceDirtSmoothable: Can only place dirt on rough stone.
LanguageData.TilledSoil.TillingDestroysExplanation: Plants will be removed when tilling is finished. This includes crops!
LanguageData.TilledSoil.RequireCostExplanation: Does the Tilled Soil require dirt to construct?
LanguageData.TilledSoil.DirtCostExplanation: How much dirt is required for one tile.
LanguageData.TilledSoil.WorkAmountExplanation: How much work is required to construct the soil. Concrete: 100, Flagstone: 500.
